name: Robot Party
description:
You are a robot. (Awesome!) 

You are lonely. (Less awesome!)

You are going to a cool human party to make cool human friends! (....awesome?)

Robot Party is a short, humorous, lighthearted text adventure about the challenges of making friends when you're a robot. You may not know much about "humans" or "social norms" or "appropriate topics of small talk" but you sure are trying your best!

Robot Party was made in Twine. (http://twinery.org/)
